title: Side Nav
shortDescription: Add a navigation menu to the side of your site.
longDescription: Add a navigation menu to the left side of your site: Customize the colors, items and icons to match any site:
author: Cloudflare Labs

categories.title: UI & Design
categories.description: Apps that make your website more beautiful and user friendly.

items.description: Add as many items to your Nav as you’d like. The two types of items you can add are Text Labels and Links. Drag and drop to re-order your nav items.

targetBlank.title: Open link in a new window

items.title: Nav Items

showCover.title: Cover the page when the side nav is open.
